heroDescription: Connecting Industries with Web 3.0 Technologies to create a more sustainable future
servicesDescription: We offer a wide range of services to help you grow your business.
servicesCta: Our team of experts will help you grow your business by providing you with the best services available.
services1Description: Luxochain SA offers advanced solutions for the creation and management of Digital Passports,ensuring the authenticity and traceability of products across all sectors. With our platform, users can seamlessly access certified information through intuitive scanning, enhancing trust and transparency. Our blockchain-based digital passports integrate comprehensive product data, including sustainability credentials and full traceability, accessible through a secure digital platform. Take advantage of Luxochain’s Advanced Digital Passport: sophisticated solutions for flawless  management of your products in any industry
services2Description: Luxochain SA offers advanced services for the development and management of Digital Twins, enhancing understanding and interaction with products across various industries. These virtual replicas provide a detailed and engaging experience, ensuring compliance and protection against counterfeiting. We create Digital Twins for a wide range of items, each with a unique digital identity on the blockchain, making every product traceable, verifiable, and secure from counterfeiting.
services2Features: Main features of Digital Twins Services:
services2FeaturesContent: Advanced Development, Digital Certificates on Blockchain, Protection against Counterfeiting
services3Description: Luxochain offers solutions for managing and certifying collectibles, enabling users to authenticate their provenance and rarity. This service creates unique engagement opportunities and adds value for consumers.
services3FeaturesContent: Authentication and Rarity, Unique Engagement, Consumer Value Enhancement
services3Description2: Our collectibles management and certification services are designed to meet the needs of collectors and provide a high-quality experience that enhances and protects their prized possessions.
services4Description: Luxochain innovates loyalty programs through the use of blockchain, creating interactive and personalized customer collection management systems to improve engagement and brand loyalty. One tangible example is the My Lugano app, developed by Luxochain, which offers automatic cashback of up to 10 percent on every purchase at more than 400 partner businesses, including stores, restaurants, and museums. Users accumulate LVGA, a digital currency, which can be used for payments in the city and for automatic cashback. This system, open to all – residents, visitors, and tourists – promotes interaction and brand loyalty, providing an engaging and rewarding experience for customers.
services4FeaturesContent: Automatic Cashback, Universal Access, Digital Currency, Wide Variety of Partners
regulationsDescription: Learn more about the new EU regulations
regulations1Description: Luxochain offers solutions for DPP integration, enhancing consumer engagement and product lifecycle management. Consumers can easily access DPPs to obtain detailed information and additional services.
regulations2Description: The Digital Product Passport (DPP) will become a mandatory regulation by the European Union, requiring all industries producing CE-marked products to comply. Luxochain is assisting companies in turning this regulation into an opportunity.
regulations3Description: DPPs provide a unique digital identity for each product, enhancing traceability and authentication throughout the entire supply chain. When integrated with blockchain technology, they offer advantages such as immutability and transparency, helping to combat counterfeiting and protect intellectual property rights.
regulations4Description: Luxochain offers a comprehensive solution for DPP integration, providing companies with the tools to create and manage DPPs for their products. Our platform ensures compliance with EU regulations and offers additional services to enhance consumer engagement and product lifecycle management.
companyDescription: Discover how we are changing the industry landscape with our innovative solutions and services to combat counterfeiting and ensure product integrity.
companyDescription2: Luxochain, founded by four Italian entrepreneurs with experience in multinational corporations and product certification, has taken a revolutionary step in the industry landscape: the creation of Digital Product Passports (DPPs) and digital twins that comply with EU regulations and regulation.
companyDescription3: The transformation of the ESPR into binding legislation, with the publication of 18 delegated acts over the period 2024-2027, highlights the importance of initiatives like Luxochain in ensuring product integrity. Located in Lugano, Switzerland, Luxochain introduces an asset authentication service that leverages blockchain to ensure the authenticity of products and combat counterfeiting.
